If the change described below has been previously tested, then the control does not need to be tested again; however, the analysis must be provided.
Analysis - Describe how the 3PAO determined that the control was previously assessed (E.g. "Reviewed ABC.doc section 1.2.3 and XYZ_2-4-2013.xls Row 100")
